item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Bypassing airport security via SQL injection (666 points | 163 comments)
2. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (46 points | 18 comments)
3. Chrome is entrenching third-party cookies that will mislead users (166 points | 62 comments)
4. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (119 points | 19 comments)
5. Dawn of a new era in Search: Balancing innovation, competition, and public good (125 points | 26 comments)
6. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (142 points | 221 comments)
7. Launch HN: Patchwork (YC S24) – Automatically add structured logs to your code (55 points | 16 comments)
8. Judge rules $400M algorithmic system illegally denied Medicaid benefits (148 points | 37 comments)
9. Judges rule Big Tech's free ride on Section 230 is over (203 points | 228 comments)
10. OpenAI is good at unminifying code (754 points | 259 comments)
11. MindsDB (YC W20) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. Show HN: A discovery-focused search engine for Hacker News (56 points | 12 comments)
13. Show HN: An open-source, local-first Webflow for your own app (124 points | 41 comments)
14. All text in Brooklyn (117 points | 46 comments)
15. How I learned to stop worrying and love userspace networking (113 points | 24 comments)
16. Show HN: Homemade automated solar concentrator (216 points | 60 comments)
17. Shufflecake: Plausible deniability for hidden filesystems on Linux (2023) (51 points | 6 comments)
18. Floating points between zero and one (49 points | 42 comments)
19. Rescuing songs that record labels forgot existed (130 points | 8 comments)
20. Web Design Museum (128 points | 28 comments)
21. Air Con: $1697 for an on/off switch (1675 points | 435 comments)
22. GNU Screen 5.0 Released (162 points | 84 comments)
23. What Life Means to Einstein (1929) [pdf] (89 points | 44 comments)
24. Update on Llama adoption (130 points | 155 comments)
25. Memos: stick private notes on your email (57 points | 44 comments)
26. How Intel Missed the iPhone: The XScale Era (73 points | 71 comments)
27. Two Dots Too Many (2008) (65 points | 28 comments)
28. Farewell Pandas, and thanks for all the fish (175 points | 101 comments)
29. 100M Token Context Windows (56 points | 7 comments)
30. Show HN: turn videos into ASCII art (open source, js+canvas) (87 points | 22 comments)
